mapper.insert: insert into payments (id, userId, contentId, paymentType, status, purchaseDate) values (PAYMENTS_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{userId}, #{contentId}, #{paymentType}, 1, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM payments p JOIN gameContents g ON p.contentId = g.id LEFT JOIN LearningGroup l ON g.id = l.contentId WHERE p.userId = #{userId}
